item.title: New Pope Elected
item.description: A new pope has been elected following the conclave. White smoke rises above the Sistine Chapel.

item.title: White Smoke Signals New Pontiff
item.description: White smoke has appeared — indicating a new pope has been chosen.

item.title: Habemus Papam: Pope Announced
item.description: The famous phrase 'Habemus Papam' was heard from the balcony — the Catholic Church has a new leader.
